creator: apache_bug@madmardy.com
text:
server compiled with
./configure --prefix=/usr/local/apache --enable-module=most --enable-
shared=max --server-uid=nobody --server-gid=nobody
make && make install

In httpd.conf:

NameVirtualHost xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx

<VirtualHost xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx>
  ServerName bla.bla.com
  ServerAlias *
  RewriteEngine On
  RewriteMap  my-map  prg:/usr/local/apache/extra_code/rewrite_map.pl
  RewriteRule ^(.+) %{HTTP_HOST}$1
  RewriteRule ^www\.(.+)$ $1
  RewriteRule ^(.*)$  ${my-map:$1}
  RewriteLog logs/rewrite_log
  LogLevel debug
  RewriteLogLevel 9
</VirtualHost>


in rewrite_log:

166.xx.xx.xx - - [03/Jul/2002:16:18:52 -0600] [fp.0catch.com/sid#80c7d84]
[rid#80dc124/initial] (5) map lookup OK: map=my-
map key=fp.madmardy.com/ -> val=

When I run the map program from the command line it works correctly.  This same 
program works under apache 1.3.19 with no problem.  The working version gives 
the following output from ps auxf:

root       898  0.0  0.1  2680  608 ?        S    Jun16   0:29 httpd
root       925  0.0  0.2  2724 1180 ?        S    Jun16   0:04  
\_ /usr/bin/perl /usr/local/apache/extra_code/rewrite_map.pl
nobody     927  0.0  0.2  2920 1404 ?        S    Jun16   1:38  \_ httpd
nobody     928  0.0  0.2  2920 1400 ?        S    Jun16   1:39  \_ httpd
nobody     929  0.0  0.2  2920 1396 ?        S    Jun16   1:59  \_ httpd

But now the rewrite map process is gone.  I have also tried statically 
compiling without success.
